fields.headline: Current travel situation in London
fields.bodyText: Transport: · King's Cross Underground station for the Victoria and Northern lines remains closed but the Metropolitan line platforms are open. · Piccadilly Line: no service between Hyde Park Corner Station and Arnos Grove Station. · Metropolitan Line: terminates at Moorgate. · Hammersmith and City Line: trains running between Hammersmith and Paddington only. Replacement buses between Royal Oak and Baker Street. · District Line: no service between High Street Kensington and Edgware Road. · Circle Line: no service until further notice. · All mainline stations are open and bus services are running normally. Entertainment: · All theatres and cinemas in central London are open. · West End shops normally open on Saturday are trading. · REM and Queen concerts in Hyde Park have been cancelled and will be rescheduled but the Blue concert at Wembley Arena will go ahead tonight.
